page.title: 11A Day In My Life
page.content: On Saturday I woke up at 7 o'clock,went downstairs to have breakfast.Then I went shepherding with Dad when I came back I had a cup of coffee.Then I rang James but he was not playing so I went into the living room and watched T.V. until 1 o'clock when I had dinner.After that I helped Dad on the farm feeding the animals until 5 o'clock.When I had finished I watched Blockbusters and the A Team and had tea.After tea I had a game of cards with my sister Kate,Alex my Dad and Sue my Mum.We played Whist and then watched the Nine O'clock News. I got ready for bed,brushed my teeth, washed my face and hands and got into bed to sleep. Charles Handy.
